title: Ewenli-shop
description: This project was made in the frame of MMI faculty cousrsework SAE203 and as a commercial project. The project represents a beat license store of an independent author Ewenli.

title: Aggregator of courses
description: A course aggregator of modern professions. Every page touching a profession contains a set of courses of different private schools including info about the course itself (price, description, rating, etc). The page will be also providing with a list of advantages and some data from HeadHunter on wages ( a russian analog of Indeed ).

title: Adorable Music
description: A mini university project made specially for SAÃ‰105 of MMI. The task was to make a page with your the most favorite albums and songs.

title: Shop of replica of luxury clothes
description: The project is a telegram bot representing a store of clothing. The store has a line of products of famous and luxurious cloth brands.
